name: Advertisements
author: Samael
description: Implements a paid /advert command for server-wide announcements. Messages are colored, logged, and throttled by a cooldown to curb spam.
features: Adds a paid /advert command players can use
Adds a cooldown via AdvertCooldown to limit spam
Adds colored broadcast messages across the server
Adds price control via AdvertPrice configuration
Adds notifications when players lack funds

name: Alcoholism
author: Samael
description: Adds drinkable alcohol that increases a player's intoxication level. High BAC blurs vision and slows movement until the effect wears off.
features: Adds alcohol items that raise BAC and gradually wear off
Adds screen blur and movement effects that scale with intoxication
Adds player notification when reaching DrunkNotifyThreshold
Adds configurable BAC settings like AlcoholTickTime
Adds multiple drink items with varying strength

name: Auto Restarter
author: Samael
description: Schedules automatic server restarts at set intervals. Players see a countdown so they can prepare before the map changes.
features: Adds scheduling for automatic restarts using RestartInterval
Adds a countdown overlay configurable via RestartCountdownFont
Adds syncing of next restart time to clients
Adds automatic changelevel when the timer expires
Adds network messages to sync the restart countdown

name: Bodygroup Editor
author: Samael
description: Spawns a bodygroup closet where players can edit their model's bodygroups. Admins may inspect others and configure the closet's model.
features: Adds a spawnable closet entity for editing bodygroups
Adds the ability to customize its model via BodyGrouperModel
Adds menu access that requires proximity or privilege
Adds an admin command to view another player's bodygroups
Adds a networked menu for editing bodygroups

name: Broadcasts
author: Samael
description: Allows staff to broadcast messages to chosen factions or classes. Every broadcast is logged and controlled through CAMI privileges.

name: Captions
author: Samael
description: Offers an API for timed on-screen captions suited for tutorials or story events. Captions can be triggered from the server or client and last for a chosen duration.
features: Adds an API for timed on-screen captions
Adds support for both client and server use
Adds an easy way to deliver story prompts
Adds commands to send captions to players
Adds duration control for each caption

name: Cards
author: Samael
description: Adds a full deck of playing cards that can be shuffled and drawn. Card draws sync to all players for simple in-game minigames.
features: Adds a full playing card deck
Adds random draws that sync to all players
Adds support for simple minigames
Adds easy reshuffling of the deck
Adds hooks so other modules can use cards

name: Chat Messages
author: Samael
description: Periodically posts automated advert messages in chat on a timer. Keeps players informed with rotating tips even when staff are offline.
features: Adds periodic server adverts to chat
Adds interval control via ChatMessagesInterval
Adds localized message support
Adds rotating tips for new players
Adds toggle to disable adverts per user

name: moduleCinematicTextName
author: Samael
features: Adds displays of cinematic splash text overlays
Adds screen darkening with letterbox bars
Adds support for scripted scenes
Adds timed fades for dramatic effect
Adds customizable text fonts

name: Climb
author: Samael
description: Enables simple ledge climbing with smooth animations triggered by the movement keys.

name: moduleCommunityCommandsName
author: Samael
features: Adds chat commands to open community links
Adds easy sharing of workshop and docs
Adds configurable commands via settings
Adds localization for command names
Adds the ability to add custom URLs

name: moduleCompassName
author: Samael
features: Adds a rotating HUD compass display
Adds spot markers showing enemy bearings
Adds support that requires workshop icons
Adds pinging of points of interest
Adds compass size configuration

name: moduleCorpseIdName
author: Samael
features: Adds the ability to identify corpses after IdentificationTime
Adds use of CorpseMessageFont for 3D2D text
Adds info display above bodies
Adds configurable identification delays
Adds logs when corpses are identified

name: Custom Cursor
author: Samael
description: Replaces the default mouse cursor with a custom design that matches the gamemode's aesthetic.
features: Adds a toggleable custom cursor for the UI
Adds a purely client-side implementation
Adds improved menu navigation
Adds a hotkey to quickly show or hide the cursor
Adds compatibility with other menu modules

name: moduleCutscenesName
author: Samael
features: Adds a framework for simple cutscene playback
Adds scenes defined through tables
Adds syncing of camera movement across clients
Adds commands to trigger cutscenes
Adds the ability for players to skip

name: Damage Numbers
author: Samael
description: Displays floating numbers whenever you deal or receive damage. Colors and scale vary by damage type to clearly show impact.
features: Adds floating combat text when hitting targets
Adds different colors for damage types
Adds display of damage dealt and received
Adds scaling text based on damage amount
Adds client option to disable numbers

name: Development HUD
author: Samael
description: Shows a staff-only HUD with live performance metrics and other development data. Access requires a CAMI privilege and can be toggled as needed.
features: Adds a staff-only development HUD
Adds font customization via DevHudFont
Adds a requirement for the CAMI privilege
Adds real-time server performance metrics
Adds a toggle command to show or hide the HUD

name: moduleDevelopmentServerName
author: Samael
features: Adds a development server mode for testing
Adds the ability to run special development functions
Adds a toggle via configuration
Adds an environment flag for dev commands
Adds logging of executed dev actions

name: moduleDiscordRelayName
author: Samael
features: Adds relaying of server logs to Discord
Adds webhook integration for connectivity
Adds formatting of real-time updates
Adds multiple webhook URLs per log type
Adds filtering to control which logs are sent

name: moduleEnhancedDeathName
author: Samael
features: Adds respawning of players at hospitals
Adds a medical recovery system
Adds support for multiple hospital spawns
Adds configurable respawn delays
Adds integration with death logs

name: moduleExtendedDescriptionsName
author: Samael
features: Adds support for long item descriptions
Adds localization for multiple languages
Adds better RP text display
Adds automatic line wrapping
Adds fallback to short descriptions

name: First Person Effects
author: Samael
description: Adds subtle head bob and view sway to the camera for a more immersive first-person feel. Intensity can be tuned or disabled altogether.

name: Flashlight
author: Samael
description: Replaces the default flashlight with dynamic lighting and adjustable brightness.

name: moduleGamemasterPointsName
author: Samael
features: Adds teleport points for game masters
Adds quick navigation across large maps
Adds saving of locations for reuse
Adds a command to list saved points
Adds sharing of points with other staff

name: moduleHudExtrasName
author: Samael
features: Adds extra HUD elements like an FPS counter
Adds fonts configurable with FPSHudFont
Adds hooks so other modules can extend
Adds performance stats display
Adds toggles for individual HUD elements

name: Instant Kill
author: Samael
description: Applies high damage multipliers for headshots, making them instantly lethal. Each weapon can have its own settings.

name: moduleJoinLeaveMessagesName
author: Samael
features: Adds announcements when players join
Adds notifications on disconnect
Adds improved community awareness
Adds relay of messages to Discord
Adds per-player toggle to hide messages

name: Load Messages
author: Samael
description: Shows a faction-specific message the first time a character is loaded. Useful for welcoming players or outlining faction rules.
features: Adds faction-based load messages
Adds execution when players first load a character
Adds customizable message text
Adds color-coded formatting options
Adds per-faction enable toggles

name: moduleLoyalismName
author: Samael
features: Adds a loyalty tier system for players
Adds the /partytier command access
Adds permission control through flags
Adds automatic tier progression
Adds customizable rewards per tier

name: moduleMapCleanerName
author: Samael
features: Adds periodic cleaning of map debris
Adds a configurable interval
Adds reduced server lag
Adds a whitelist for protected entities
Adds manual cleanup commands

name: Model Pay
author: Samael
description: Pays characters wages determined by their player model. Different models can have unique salaries and exclusions are configurable.
features: Adds payment to characters based on model
Adds custom wage definitions
Adds integration into the economy
Adds config to exclude certain models
Adds logs of wages issued

name: moduleModelTweakerName
author: Samael
features: Adds an entity to tweak prop models
Adds adjustments for scale and rotation
Adds easy UI controls
Adds saving of tweaked props between restarts
Adds undo support for recent tweaks

name: NPC Drops
author: Samael
description: Sets up loot tables so specific NPCs drop items when killed. Weighted chances encourage players to search bodies after combat.
features: Adds NPCs that drop items on death
Adds DropTable to define probabilities
Adds encouragement for looting
Adds editable drop tables per NPC type
Adds weighted chances for rare items

name: modulePermaRemoveName
author: Boz [Base Code] & Samael [Rewrite]
features: Adds ability to permanently delete map entities
Adds logging for each removed entity
Adds an admin-only command
Adds confirmation prompts before removal
Adds restore list to undo mistakes

name: moduleRadioName
author: Samael
features: Adds a radio chat channel for players
Adds font configuration via RadioFont
Adds workshop models for radios
Adds frequency channels for groups
Adds handheld radio items

name: moduleRaisedWeaponsName
author: Samael
features: Adds auto-lowering of weapons when running
Adds a raise delay set by WeaponRaiseSpeed
Adds prevention of accidental fire
Adds a toggle to keep weapons lowered
Adds compatibility with melee weapons

name: Realistic Damage
author: Samael
description: Scales damage based on hit body parts and applies other tweaks for realistic combat.

name: Realistic View
author: Samael
description: Switches to a full-body first-person camera with smooth transition effects. Works with animations and can fall back to third-person.
features: Adds a first-person view that shows the full body
Adds immersive camera transitions
Adds compatibility with animations
Adds smooth leaning animations
Adds optional third-person override

name: moduleAnonymousRumorsName
author: Samael
features: Adds an anonymous rumour chat command
Adds hiding of the sender's identity
Adds encouragement for roleplay intrigue
Adds a cooldown to prevent spam
Adds admin logging of rumour messages

name: Shoot Locks
author: Samael
description: Lets players blast door locks open with gunfire. Success chances are configurable, making it a risky breach option.

name: moduleLockpickingName
features: Adds a simple lockpick tool for doors
Adds logging of successful picks
Adds brute-force style gameplay
Adds configurable pick time
Adds chance for tools to break

name: moduleSlotMachineName
author: Samael
features: Adds a slot machine minigame
Adds a workshop model for the machine
Adds handling of payouts to winners
Adds customizable payout odds
Adds sound and animation effects

name: Heavy Weapon Slowdown
author: Samael
description: Reduces movement speed while carrying heavy weapons. Penalties are customizable per weapon and revert once the weapon is holstered.
features: Adds slower movement while holding heavy weapons
Adds speed penalties defined per weapon
Adds encouragement for strategic choices
Adds customizable weapon speed table
Adds automatic speed restore when switching

name: Stun Gun
author: Samael
description: Introduces a taser weapon that temporarily incapacitates targets. Stun time, range, and optional damage effects are fully configurable.
features: Adds a taser weapon that immobilizes targets
Adds StunTime and MaxDist as configurable settings
Adds optional damage and post-process effects
Adds networked stun animations
Adds logs when players are tased

name: moduleTyingName
author: Samael
features: Adds handcuff items that restrain players
Adds logging for tie and untie events
Adds support for roleplay arrests
Adds timed escape minigames for prisoners
Adds compatibility with the search submodule

name: moduleCodeUtilitiesName
author: Samael
features: Adds extra helper functions in lia.util
Adds simplified utilities for common scripting tasks
Adds a central library used by other modules
Adds utilities for networking data
Adds shared constants for modules

name: View Bobbing
author: Samael
description: Applies subtle camera bobbing while you move to enhance immersion. Intensity and frequency are adjustable through options.

name: Viewmodel Animations
author: Samael
description: Enables VManip animations and gestures across the framework. Items can trigger custom hand movements with fallbacks if VManip isn't installed.
features: Adds VManip animation support
Adds hand gestures for items
Adds functionality within Lilia
Adds API for custom gesture triggers
Adds fallback animations when VManip is missing

name: moduleWarrantSystemName
author: Samael
features: Adds ability to issue and remove player warrants
Adds notifications displayed to players
Adds logging of all warrant actions
Adds CAMI privileges for warrant management
Adds timed expiration for warrants

name: moduleWarTableName
author: Samael
features: Adds an interactive 3D war table
Adds the ability to plan operations on a map
Adds a workshop model
Adds marker placement for strategies
Adds support for multiple map layouts
